segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first glance, with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that faucet is gushing water non-stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a huge mess, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's oblivious, drying her plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water puddle—gross, she'll slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably gonna get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching for the cookie jar, looking so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand out, begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking snacks behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden's peaceful—such a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the floor getting ruined by all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just begging for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
